modName: Bound Blades Katana - with Bound Armory Compatibility
summary: This little mod adds a Bound Blades Sword to the game. It features full compatibility with Bound Armory (and it's rebalance plugins) as well as SkyRe and SPERG.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]This mod adds a Bound Blades Sword to the game. The Spell Tome can be found in places where you would expect Blades' Equipment. The Bound Blades Sword starts out as strong as a regular Blades Sword (11 points of damage) and later upgrades to the base damage of the Dragonsbane (14 points of damage), once you unlock the Mystic Binding Perk.[/b][/center]

[center]The mod and spell itself are standalone and the weapon behaves just like a regular Bound Sword. However the mod has a built in compatibility with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45042/?]Bound Armory[/url]. That means, if you load any of the Bound Armory Plugins or Rebalance Plugins after Bound Katana.esp, the Bound Blades Sword will adopt the damage scaling from that mod. This includes the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24445//?]SPERG[/url] version of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45042/?]Bound Armory[/url].[/center]

[center]An optional SkyRe version can be found in the download section. While it is standalone, it does contain the damage scaling from Bound Armory- SkyRe, and will not provide a smooth experience without the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45042/?]Bound Armory - SkyRe[/url] mod.[/center]

[center]If you are looking for a japanese mythology inspired gameplay and/or are a fan of the Naruto Anime, the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51136/?]The Uchiha Clan[/url] may be for you. The Bound Katanas also make an appearance there, as i have granted permission to the author to use the meshes.[/center]
author: Gruftlord
